Hi Group!

Meta-newbie here. Understand that Heritrix is not currently supp=
orted on OS X, but have also 
seen some posts referencing that as a pure Ja=
va app it does and has run on OS X. 

Does anyone have recent experience wi=
th this implementation?

There seems to be a large learning curve associate=
d with simply moving from the install 
process for Linux, to an OS-X-compat=
ible install. Any pointers, docs, or other guidance you 
can provide?

Than=
ks in advance for any help you can provide. I promise I will report back to=
 you on 
performance and other issues -- if I can get it up and running!

R=
ob Mothershead
Azimuth LLC
313 475 1682
